channel.title: Need help with dialogue
channel.description: i need to know how to make my game send the dialogue ot a new dialogue if my player has item 1305 and 10 of them. im going to keep reposting until somone helps me since everyone wants to skipp my posts. enjoy the spam

item.title: Need help with dialogue
item.dc:creator: @Mario_PvP Mario PvP
item.description:
@Mario_PvP wrote:

Ill give you the code…
next time behave.
if(playerHasItem(1305, 10)) {
talk(“INSERT_TEXT”, REPLACEWITHNPCIDFORSHOWNFACE);
} else {
return;
}
something like that

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with dialogue
item.dc:creator: @WowILikeToCode WowILikeToCode
item.description:
@WowILikeToCode wrote:

[quote=“Shadow742000, post:7, topic:441324”]it doesnt run off a button, who said this? its a god damn dialogue! dialogues run like this buddy

case 666:
talk(“hi, this is a dialogue”, 2244);
break;[/quote]

your using delta or something, thats why your confused. i was helping for PI because thats what all the retards use

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with dialogue

item.description:
@Shadow742000 wrote:

it doesnt run off a button, who said this? its a god damn dialogue! dialogues run like this buddy

case 666:
talk(“hi, this is a dialogue”, 2244);
break;

item.title: Need help with dialogue
item.dc:creator: @WowILikeToCode WowILikeToCode
item.description:
@WowILikeToCode wrote:

well like if your clicking a button in an option they run off clickingbuttons

alternitavely just stick it in the dialougehandler in like

if (c.getItems()playerHasItem(1305, 10)) {
c.nextChat = 1;
} else {
c.nextchat = 2;
c.sendMessage(“Stop being so arrogant and people may fucking want to help you”);
}

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with dialogue
item.dc:creator: @WowILikeToCode WowILikeToCode
item.description:
@WowILikeToCode wrote:

if an if statement.

if (c.getItems()playerHasItem(1305, 10)) { //do this } else { //do this }

This is a basic Java statement
